abstract: Belle Willox joined the WAAAFs because she always wanted to be a flyer like Amy Johnson.
description: Belle Willox joined the WAAAFs because she always wanted to be a flyer like Amy Johnson. She joined when she was 18 and, though she never got to pilot a plane herself, there were certainly many ups and downs during her time in the war.
